section.title: List Breeder Bills of Materials
section.para: To access the master list of breeder bills of materials (BOM), go to Products > Breeder Bill of Materials > List. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Breeder Bill of Materials master list

section.para: To search for a breeder BOM, begin typing in the Search for field at the top of the screen. As you type, the item list will automatically scroll toward the item number you are typing. You can also search for items manually by scrolling through the list.
